entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of snow or ice pellets. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow or ice pellets beginning this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 3.
